select_pattern: Select a pattern to see details
app_help_content:
MOEX & Crypto Backtest System - Help

1. Application Overview

This application allows you to backtest trading strategies based on Japanese candlestick patterns on MOEX and cryptocurrency markets.

2. Getting Started

Step 1: Create a Strategy

  • Click "New" in Strategy Management
  • Give your strategy a name
  • Select patterns to include
  • Choose entry and exit rules
  • Set risk parameters
  • Click "Save"

3. Pattern Explanations

Use the left panel to browse all 61 candlestick patterns...

CDL2CROWS.description: Two Crows pattern: A bearish reversal pattern consisting of three candles in an uptrend.
CDL2CROWS.interpretation: Bearish reversal signal indicating potential trend change.

CDL3BLACKCROWS.description: Three Black Crows: Three consecutive long black candles closing lower than previous.
CDL3BLACKCROWS.interpretation: Strong bearish reversal signal after an uptrend.
